(Brix/Bronco suffers from a split personality. Usually he's Brix, 
faithful Maximal. But when he gets caught up in battle, he becomes 
the renegade Bronco, who will kill anyone he wants. He is especially 
mad at Fliq because Fliq brought Brix back to life, leaving Bronco 
usually in the subconcious. And you forgot Fliq's attack on Oinker, 
but I'll post a new one.")

Fliq's plasma shots went wide. He stared down at Oinker, who hadn't 
noticed him yet. Good, he thought, still with surprise on my side. He 
activated his chainsaw, and was about to go straight at him, when two 
missles flew by him, he saw that it was Brix!

"Brix! What are you...." and than in a whisper he added, "Bronco."

He fired a wide shots off from his plasma cannons and than turned 
back to Oinker.

"I can't deal with him Bronco now. I need to defeat this bot!"

Fliq turned on his chainsaw and charged Oinker from above.


Meanwhile, Bronco dodgen the plasma shots easily.

"Is that the best you can do?!? Let's go!!!"

Bronco charges towards Fliq.
